meta.notes: All new rules must be recorded in BOTH CLAUDE.md and this config. Never add a rule to only one location.

git.notes: NEVER merge directly to main. Always create PR. User reviews and merges manually.

polish.notes: Run /polish-milestone after each milestone. Steps must run sequentially to avoid conflicts.

workflow.add: Detect feature/bug requests in plain language → call /gsd:add-todo → create structured markdown
workflow.list: Raw prompt 'show todos' or /gsd:check-todos → list with areas/age → allow selection
workflow.work: Raw prompt 'start working on X' → find matching todo → move to done/ → load context → begin implementation

todos.notes: Support both CLI commands and raw prompts. Future-proof by following GSD pattern: capture → store → route to action.
